data.name: We don't die here Demo
data.detailed_description:
GAMEPLAY:

-Your HP is your only resource.

-Turn based, attack telegraph combat. Enemy attacks will be telegraphed before the attack connects next turn. You must either dodge heavy attacks, or block light attacks, to avoid 100% of the damage. Failing to read a telegraph correctly and using the incorrect defense method results in you taking heavy damage.

-2 (sort of) endings. ("But wait-" I hear you ask. "This is just the start of the story. How are there 2 endings already?" You'll see what I mean when you play it.)
-1 hidden, collectable doll.

STORY:
An entirely unknown threat has descended on your people and diminished your population from 10 billion to nearly nothing in 4 short weeks. This is your extinction event.

You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this.

But, you're about to be overrun...

Demo release date: August 24, 2022
Full game release date: Some time in 2023

Demo play time: 15 - 25 minutes.

This game shares the same universe as Ara and the Empty Universe and Our way down.

data.short_description: An unknown enemy has descended on your world. Population decimated from 10 billion to a little over 100 survivors. This is your extinction event. You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this. But, you are about to be overrun...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 duo or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • Storage: 615 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any will do
  • Additional Notes: This game isn't really demanding.

data.legal_notice: DO NOT take my stuff and call it yours, legal jargon, don't be a jerk.
